title: Windows Store payments for UWP Sideloaded Apps
body: Allow UWP sideloaded apps (distributed outside of Window Store) to formally use the Store Payment and Licensing infrastructure.

comments.body: So when you say the app has been distributed outside the store that brings up some questions.  How was the app signed?  Using your own cert and product ID?  How would the store know which app you are?  What is the product family name in this state?
